Package it.polimi.ingsw.effects.build

Class BuildBeforeMove

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.effects.build.StandardBuild
it.polimi.ingsw.effects.build.BuildBeforeMove
public class BuildBeforeMove
extends StandardBuild
This class implements whether a player can build before moving.

      The general build method

      a Set<Cell> collect that only has the cells where the player can build in

    • checkBuildConditions

      protected boolean checkBuildConditions​(Cell workerCell, Turn turn)
      Determines whether the chosen worker can (or still can) build this turn. Unlike the parent class, this method also considers the possibility that a build may occur before a move. The number of builds refers exclusively to the number of standard builds made (ie after moving). So a player with builds = 1 can build before moving and after moving.
      Overrides:
      checkBuildConditions in class StandardBuild
      Parameters:
      workerCell - the worker's Cell
      turn - the player's turn
      Returns:
      returns true only and only if the worker considered: is a worker of the current player, has already moved and has not already built "builds" times this turn.
